jd_text:
Senior Software Engineer - Full Stack Development

Job Description:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in full-stack development. You will lead technical initiatives, mentor junior developers, and design scalable systems.

Required Skills:
- Python or Java (backend)
- React or Vue.js (frontend)
- PostgreSQL or MySQL (databases)
- Docker and Kubernetes
- System design and architecture
- AWS or Azure cloud platforms
- Git version control

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable web applications
- Lead code reviews and technical discussions
- Mentor junior engineers
- Collaborate with product and design teams
- Optimize database queries and system performance
- Deploy and maintain applications on cloud platforms

Benefits:
- Competitive salary (150k-200k)
- Health insurance
- Remote work flexibility
- Professional development budget

7 years of full-stack development experience. Expert in Python, React, and AWS. Led 3 product launches. Strong system design background.

- Python, Java, JavaScript
- React, Vue.js, Node.js
- PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB
- Docker, Kubernetes
- AWS (EC2, RDS, Lambda, S3)
- System Architecture and Design
- Git, CI/CD pipelines

- Mentored 5 junior developers
